entry.title: Introduction of Myself
entry.content:
Zhangxuan Gu is currently a Ph.D student at Department of Computer Science and Technology in Shanghai Jiao Tong University in China. His research advisors are Prof. Liqing Zhang and Prof. Li Niu. His research interests include computer vision, semantic segmentation and machine learning, especially, transfer learning in semantic segmentation.

Education

  • PhD in Computer Science
    Shanghai Jiao Tong University
    2016 - Now
  • BSc in Mathematics
    Shanghai Jiao Tong University
    2012 - 2016

Publications

2019

  • Gu, Zhangxuan & Zhang, Jianfu & Pan, Ziqi & Zhao, Haohua & Zhang, Liqing. (2019). Clothes Keypoints Localization and Attribute Recognition via Prior Knowledge. 550-555. 10.1109/ICME.2019.00101.
  • Zhangxuan Gu, Siyuan Zhou, Li Niu, Zihan Zhao, Liqing Zhang. (2020). Context-aware Feature Generation For Zero-shot Semantic Segmentation. [ACMMM2020] Paper Code

Submitted

  • Hard Pixel Mining for Depth Privileged Semantic Segmentation. [TMM]
